description: Paddle through the gentle waters of the Werse River, enjoying the peaceful surroundings and fresh air.

locationInfo.description: A picturesque canoeing route with calm waters, perfect for a relaxing adventure.
safetyTips: Wear a life jacket at all times.
Bring a waterproof bag for valuables.

description: Explore Münster’s old town with a self-guided tour through its charming streets and landmarks.

locationInfo.description: A historic district filled with medieval architecture, bustling squares, and fascinating stories.
safetyTips: Be aware of cyclists in shared pedestrian zones.

description: Take a refreshing hike through the trails of Wienburgpark and enjoy the crisp autumn air.

locationInfo.description: A scenic nature park with diverse wildlife and serene walking trails.
safetyTips: Bring a small backpack with snacks and water.

description: Enjoy a relaxing lakeside picnic and watch the local bird species in their natural habitat.
groupSuitability: Ideal for a quiet afternoon outdoors

locationInfo.description: A beautiful lakeside park with plenty of green space and a variety of bird species to observe.
safetyTips: Pack light and bring a picnic blanket.
Check the weather forecast before heading out.

description: Capture stunning images of Münster’s botanical gardens and Schloss Münster with your camera.

locationInfo.description: A historic palace garden with beautifully maintained greenery and seasonal flowers.
safetyTips: Bring extra batteries for your camera.
Take photos during golden hour for the best lighting.
